page.title: 03A School Day In Thirsk.
page.content: When I get up in the morning, I have a wash, and put on my uniform. It is all brown except for a blue shirt. My blazer has the emblem of the school on it, which is the white Yorkshire Rose with a Falcon. You can wear brown or black trousers, and grey socks, but most boys wear white socks to make them look hard. I have my breakfast and then go to catch the bus. I am in the First Year of my Secondary Education. Our school has lots of class rooms which each have about 3O desks. Also, there are two Dining Rooms, a Hall and a Sports Hall. The Sports Hall has 4 Badminton courts, a 5-aside Football pitch and other things which, are fun.
